q.quote: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
q.author: Lil Wayne

q.quote: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
q.author: Connie Stevens

q.quote: Beware the fury of a patient man.
q.author: Lil Wayne

q.quote: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.
q.author: George Carlin

q.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
q.author: George Herbert

q.quote: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
q.author: George Washington

q.quote: I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.
q.author: Winston Churchill

q.quote: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.
q.author: George Carlin

q.quote: Half a truth is often a great lie.
q.author: Benjamin Franklin

q.quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
q.author: George Carlin

q.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
q.author: Bernard Williams

q.quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
q.author: Bernard Williams

q.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
q.author: George Carlin

q.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
q.author: Bernard Williams

q.quote: We were old sinners - but when we came to Christ we are not sinners anymore.
q.author: Joel Osteen
